channel.title: Carl Rinsch on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Carl Rinsch on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Director Carl Rinsch Was in a ‘State of Psychosis’ at Time of Alleged Netflix Fraud, Defense Argues
item.description: Defense lawyers for director Carl Rinsch intend to argue that he was in a “state of psychosis” when he was making “White Horse,” and therefore cannot be found guilty of defraud

item.title: Director Carl Rinsch Was in a ‘State of Psychosis’ at Time of Alleged Netflix Fraud, Defense Argues
item.description: Defense lawyers for director Carl Rinsch intend to argue that he was in a “state of psychosis” when he was making “White Horse,” and therefore cannot be found guilty of defraud
